ListItem.name: LI_702273
ListItem.title: Pending - Completion of this CAP Cancer Protocol is awaiting expert consultation

ListItem.name: LI_702272
ListItem.title: Completed - This CAP Cancer Protocol or some elements have been performed following expert consultation

ListItem.name: LI_36572
ListItem.title: Preoperative therapy given, type not specified

ListItem.name: LI_6305
ListItem.title: Focal (single or few scattered anaplastic cells)

ListItem.name: LI_6306
ListItem.title: Diffuse (clusters or sheets of anaplastic cells)

Question.name: Q_359616
Question.title: Distance from Tumor to Closest Margin

ListItem.name: LI_6315
ListItem.title: Not applicable (no regional lymph nodes submitted or found)

ListItem.name: LI_359628
ListItem.title: All regional lymph nodes negative for tumor

ListItem.name: LI_359629
ListItem.title: Tumor present in regional lymph node(s)

Question.name: Q_11076
Question.title: Number of Lymph Nodes with Tumor

Question.name: Q_6333
Question.title: The Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study Postsurgical Clinical Grouping System (Note H)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_6333_1
Property.val: The Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Study Postsurgical Clinical Grouping System

DisplayedItem.name: DI_6334
DisplayedItem.title: Grouping is based on pretreatment tumor characteristics. Clinical information required to definitively assign stage group (e.g., gross residual disease or distant metastatic disease) may not be available to the pathologist. Alternatively, this checklist may not be applicable to some situations (e.g., group IIIA). If applicable, the appropriate stage group may be assigned by the pathologist.

ListItem.name: LI_6338
ListItem.title: Group IA Localized tumor, confined to site of origin, completely resected

ListItem.name: LI_6339
ListItem.title: Group IB Localized tumor, infiltrating beyond site of origin, completely resected

ListItem.name: LI_6341
ListItem.title: Group IIA Localized tumor, gross total resection, but with microscopic residual disease

ListItem.name: LI_6342
ListItem.title: Group IIB Locally extensive tumor (spread to regional lymph nodes), completely resected

ListItem.name: LI_6343
ListItem.title: Group IIC Locally extensive tumor (spread to regional lymph nodes), gross total resection, but microscopic residual disease

ListItem.name: LI_6345
ListItem.title: Group IIIA Localized or locally extensive tumor, gross residual disease after biopsy only

ListItem.name: LI_6346
ListItem.title: Group IIIB Localized or locally extensive tumor, gross residual disease after major resection (greater than 50% debulking)

ListItem.name: LI_6348
ListItem.title: Group IV Any size primary tumor, with or without regional lymph node involvement, with distant metastases, without respect to surgical approach to primary tumor.

Question.name: Q_20733
Question.title: Modified Site, Size, Metastasis Staging for Rhabdomyosarcoma (for relevant stage) (Note H)

Property.name: p_rptTxt_20733_1
Property.val: Modified Site, Size, Metastasis Staging for Rhabdomyosarcoma

DisplayedItem.name: DI_20735
DisplayedItem.title: Staging is based on pretreatment tumor characteristics. Clinical information required to definitively assign stage (e.g., nodal status or distant metastatic disease) may not be available to the pathologist.

ListItem.name: LI_24939
ListItem.title: Stage I (requires all of the following to be true: Tumor involves favorable site (i.e., biliary tract / liver, orbit, head and neck [excluding parameningeal] or genitourinary site [excluding bladder / prostate]), and; Tumor metastatic to distant site not identified)

ListItem.name: LI_24940
ListItem.title: Stage II (requires all of the following to be true: Tumor involves unfavorable site (i.e., bladder / prostate, extremity, parameningeal or other site not mentioned in stage I), and; Tumor size less than or equal to 5 cm, and; Tumor involvement of lymph nodes not identified, and; Tumor metastatic to distant site not identified)

ListItem.name: LI_24941
ListItem.title: Stage III (requires that one of the following be true: Tumor involves unfavorable site, is less than or equal to 5 cm, and involves regional lymph nodes, but distant metastases are not identified, or; Tumor involves unfavorable site and is greater than 5 cm, with or without regional lymph node involvement, but distant metastases are not identified)

ListItem.name: LI_20744
ListItem.title: Tumor involves unfavorable site, is less than or equal to 5 cm, and involves regional lymph nodes, but distant metastases are not identified

ListItem.name: LI_20745
ListItem.title: Tumor involves unfavorable site and is greater than 5 cm, with or without regional lymph node involvement, but distant metastases are not identified

ListItem.name: LI_24942
ListItem.title: Stage IV (requires that distant metastases be present)

ListItem.name: LI_36589
ListItem.title: Other (e.g., PAX3-NCOA1 or other variant translocation) (specify)
